ch.qos.logback.core.layout

Class EchoLayout<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.qos.logback.core.spi.ContextAwareBase
      • ch.qos.logback.core.LayoutBase<E>
        • ch.qos.logback.core.layout.EchoLayout<E>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Layout<E>, ContextAware, LifeCycle

    public class EchoLayout<E>
extends LayoutBase<E>
    Echos the incoming object adding a line separator character(s) at the end.

    • Method Detail

      • doLayout

        public java.lang.String doLayout(E event)
        Description copied from interface: Layout
        Transform an event (of type Object) and return it as a String after appropriate formatting.

        Taking in an object and returning a String is the least sophisticated way of formatting events. However, it is remarkably CPU-effective.

        Parameters:
        event - The event to format
        Returns:
        the event formatted as a String
